QuestData.Title: Blood in the Tides
QuestData.Description:
Curse these slimy wenches!
Their singin' sets men's hearts afire and their brains adrift.
My ship's aground. My cargo's lost.
Nothin' for it now but to fight!
QuestData.RewardText: <Keelson looks up at you from a pile of siren corpses.>$B$BI need a drink.
